title: Watermelon, Feta, and Arugula Salad with Balsamic Glaze
summary: Watermelon, Feta, and Arugula Salad with Balsamic Glaze might be just the side dish you are searching for. This recipe serves 8 and costs $1.24 per serving. Watching your figure? This gluten free recipe has 122 calories, 5g of protein, and 6g of fat per serving. From preparation to the plate, this recipe takes about 45 minutes. It will be a hit at your Summer event. 1 person has tried and liked this recipe. Head to the store and pick up baby arugula, balsamic vinegar glaze, feta cheese, and a few other things to make it today. All things considered, we decided this recipe deserves a spoonacular score of 49%. This score is solid. Similar recipes include Watermelon Arugulan And Feta Salad, Watermelon, Fetan and Arugula Salad, and Watermelon & Fetan Arugula Salad with Honey-Lemon Vinaigrette.
instructions: Preparation                                                        Arrange arugula over large platter. Scatterwatermelon, then feta over. Drizzle withbalsamic glaze and sprinkle with pepper.                                                Ingredient tip:               Balsamic vinegar glazecan be found in the vinegar section at manysupermarkets. If unavailable, boil 3/4 cupbalsamic vinegar in a small saucepan untilreduced to 3 tablespoons, 6 to 7 minutes.
